message: I've been to the last two. I think I can get some discounted or sold-out tickets, if you guys are interested. http://worldsciencefestival.com/
Not absolutely certain about some of the sold out ones, but discounted.
Do you mean for next year? This was in June I believe. I was going to go but it costed too much.
I'm getting email from last year as "new messages." if I haven't been making sense here, it's because gmail's Effing with me.
Ah, I was wondering too.  WSF does look cool though.
i actually went to some of the outdoor (free stuff) down by houston street.  the kids I took  enjoyed it a lot
